euBadge.title: EU Digital Product Passport
euBadge.description: The EU Digital Product Passport is a digital system that stores and shares product information across the value chain, making data accessible to consumers and businesses to promote sustainability and circular economy practices.

hero.title: Smart digital passports
hero.description: Effortlessly connect every product or project to a digital passport. Wazzat simplifies asset tracking, documentation, and full lifecycle service — making critical info instantly accessible for manufacturers, contractors, and service teams. Tags can be visible (QR) or invisible (NFC/RFID), enabling seamless access with any phone (no app required). Just scan and go—no more lost manuals or service history.

billingStress.title: Thursday evening. You're billing for a project from three weeks ago.
billingStress.description: Which screws did I use? What type of insulation? Which window was installed? Did I add that extra panel I discussed with the client? With Wazzat, all of that's logged visually, sorted per client and instantly findable. No more panic attacks, no more time wasted.

windowDamage.title: Discussion about project delivery
windowDamage.description: The client calls about damage to the window. 'How was this installed?' With Wazzat you have all the details at hand immediately – photos, specifications, agreements. No discussion, just facts.

serviceRequest.title: Service done right the first time
serviceRequest.description: The end customer's window isn't closing properly and leaks water. A service request is filed through the app. The professional sends someone with the right materials – fittings and rubbers – and it's fixed in one go.
